Package uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.io

Class Summary
Parser This is a class which handles reading input from a file and converting it into data usable by the simulator.
SimpleXMLWriter This class handles outputting XML to a file an a easy to use manner.
 

Exception Summary
BeaconsParseException The exception defined by this class is for errors while parsing beacons from a text file.
DataOutputException The exception defined by this class is for errors with outputting data from a simulation.
InformationSourcesParseException The exception defined by this class is for errors while parsing information sources from a text file.
MapParseException The exception defined by this class is for errors encountered when parsing a map from a text file.
MobileObjectsParseException The exception defined by this class is for errors encountered when parsing mobile objects from a text file.
ParseException This class is a supertype for errors which occur while parsing from a text file.
